enhanced_by.reason: The toString method iterates over the fields returned by getFields() to build its string representation.
The toString method includes the name of the form, which is retrieved by getName().
Adding fields to the form will affect the output of the toString method, making it necessary to test the method after state changes.

enhanced_by.method_name: process(Map<String, String>, Map<String, String>, Map<String, Form>)
enhanced_by.reason: Processing the form can change its state, which may affect the output of the toString method.
